short.en_US:
******FIND ME**********
Era mod, requires Era 2.46 or higher

;author: Valery


Description: adds a new button near map adventure minimap, which will open a search selection dialog. After selecting the object you look for, press "1" key (upper left side of your keyboard) to display all objects of that type/subtype. Each key press will display next object, so you can check for additional infos in map. Once all objects all that type&subtype are looped, you will get a "loop end" message and w
